project_summary.title: Where is the question - Chrome Extension
project_summary.purpose: This extension helps users navigate long chat histories in ChatGPT and Gemini by placing markers on the scrollbar for each user question. Clicking a marker scrolls to that question.

gemini_development.key_challenge: Identifying the correct and stable HTML selectors for user messages on the Gemini website, as the site uses dynamic class names.
gemini_development.future_debugging_notes: Refer to GEMINI_DEV_NOTES.md for a full summary and a guide on how to debug future issues with Gemini integration.

latest_changes: Removed 'Show questions only' filter functionality from the popup.
Updated README.md with bilingual content and new installation instructions.
Restored CSS for popup to fix display issues.
Implemented dynamic positioning for question marker tooltips to prevent off-screen display.
Replaced yellow background highlight for favorited questions with a prominent star icon, dynamically added/removed via JavaScript and styled with CSS.
Enhanced tooltips to display attached filenames and handle generic image placeholders ('[업로드된 이미지]', '[업로드된 이미지들]').
Refactored tooltip content generation to use HTML strings (<div> tags) and `innerHTML` for correct newline formatting.
Removed conflicting CSS text truncation properties from `.question-marker-tooltip`.
Initiated major performance refactoring by modularizing `content.js` into `src/modules/config.js`, `src/modules/dom.js`, and `src/modules/storage.js`.
Rewrote `content.js` to contain a leaner `MarkerManager` class, orchestrating interactions between the new modules.
Updated `manifest.json` to load modularized JavaScript files in the correct order.
Implemented incremental marker updates in `MarkerManager.updateMarkers` to optimize performance by managing markers dynamically (add, remove, update) instead of full re-renders.
